Changelog
=========

0.5 - 2014-12-24
----------------

 * Force parsing to be unicode everywhere

0.4 - 2014-05-25
----------------

 * Fixed Python 2/3 compatibility

0.3 - 2014-05-25
----------------

* Rename markey.handlebars to markey.underscore. This actually is
  what the module implements.


0.2 - 2014-05-17
----------------

* Fix release builds.


0.1 - 2014-05-17
----------------

* Initial release.
